Package it.polimi.ingsw.am49.client.view.gui.controllers

Class BoardController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am49.client.view.gui.controllers.GuiController
it.polimi.ingsw.am49.client.view.gui.controllers.BoardController
public class BoardController extends GuiController
Controller class for the game board GUI.
